name: Bullyeet Hell
description:
IDEAL FOR VERTICAL MONITORS

The aliens are invading hell! Abduct devils with your superior technology, that allows you to jump on them, avoiding all the bullets of their primitive two-dimensional world. Will you be able to capture them all or will you be defeated by their bullet hell?

Credits: Andrea Rosini and Juan Camilo Osorio Arizabaleta https://juancaos.itch.io/

Music: Shaolin Dub under CC 4.0 License https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Shaolin_Dub

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game A Week" (WinterSemester 2020/21)
